author: igorlogius

open.description: Open hovered link or selection in background tabs

close.description: Close tabs which have urls that match the hovered link or links in selection

select.description: Select tabs which have urls that match the hovered link or links in selection

bookmark.description: Bookmark hovered link or links in selection

download.description: Download hovered link or or links in the selection

action_0.description: 1st copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_1.description: 2nd copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_2.description: 3rd copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_3.description: 4th copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_4.description: 5th copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_5.description: 6th copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_6.description: 7th copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_7.description: 8th copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_8.description: 9th copy action on hovered link or links in selection

action_9.description: 10th action on hovered link or links in selection

description: Add extra copy functions to links and selections. Works with single or muliple links or selections
name: Link Extras
